Class WordInfo

java.lang.Object
appDomain.WordInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<WordInfo>
public class WordInfo extends Object implements Serializable, Comparable<WordInfo>
Represents information about a word, including the files and line numbers where it occurs. Implements Serializable for saving to disk and Comparable for tree sorting.
See Also:

    • addOccurrence

      public void addOccurrence(String filename, int lineNumber)
      Adds an occurrence of the word in a specified file and line number.
      Parameters:
      filename - The file where the word occurs.
      lineNumber - The line number where the word occurs.

    • getWord

      public String getWord()
      Gets the word being tracked.
      Returns:
      The word.

    • getOccurrences

      public Map<String,Set<Integer>> getOccurrences()
      Gets the map of occurrences for the word.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are filenames and values are sets of line numbers.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(WordInfo other)
      Compares this WordInfo object to another for sorting.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<WordInfo>
      Parameters:
      other - The other WordInfo object to compare.
      Returns:
      A negative, zero, or positive value based on lexicographical order of words.
